alert.note: Alert for Converse County Lower Elevations; East Platte County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued February 21 at 7:51AM MST until February 21 at 2:00PM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...West winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 75 mph. * WHERE...Converse County Lower Elevations and east Platte County, including the cities of Wheatland, Guernsey, and Douglas. * WHEN...Until 2 PM MST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Mainly to transportation. Strong cross winds will be hazardous to light weight or high profile vehicles, including campers and tractor trailers.
info.instruction: A High Wind Warning means a hazardous high wind event is expected or occurring. Sustained wind speeds of at least 40 MPH or gusts of 58 MPH or more can lead to property damage.

area.areaDesc: Converse County Lower Elevations; East Platte County
